blogPost.title:
GameStop is trading below $100 for the first time since January 26, 2021. 
 
$GME ▼ 58%
blogPost.author: Stocktwits

localize.full_text:
GameStop自2021年1月26日以来首次低于100美元。
 
$GME ▼ 58%

GameStop自2021年1月26日以來首次低於100美元。
 
$GME ▼ 58%

previous.excerpt:
The only reason GME is where it is right now is through blatant market
manipulation.

On January 28th GME was over $500 pre market. It had sensational momentum.
Buying GME on the 27th at $300+ was not a bad play. GME had already gravity
slingshotted round Earth and had blown past the moon, on course…
previous.title: Remember- GEE EM EE is only where it is because of blatant market manipulation.

localize.title: 记住--GEE EM EE之所以能有今天的成就，是因为公然操纵市场。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
GME能有现在的地位，唯一的原因是通过公然的市场。
操纵。

1月28日，GME前期市场超过500美元。它的势头很轰动。
27日在300多美元买入GME不失为一个好戏。GME已经重力
绕着地球飞了一圈，飞过了月球，正准备... ...
